Help?¶

If case you require any help regarding the usage or development of the Kafka Topology Builder, don’t hesitate to contact our gitter community <https://gitter.im/kafka-topology-builder/community#>. In the future, when there is the request we might as well create a mailing list or other method of communication that help people using this project.
